name: Kickstarter - Marc's Dark Theme
description:
Darker Theme for Kickstarter.com

Updated for new Kickstarter redesign.



Please feel free to leave a comment about any issues
additional_info:
Update 05/09/2018
 - Updated profile page, fixed background behind username, as well as the pledge wheel to the bottom right of the username header card. Changed the share and edit your profile text as well. 
 - Updated Comments on users profile.
 - Updated Color of active "tab"/page on user profile

Update 12/19/2017
Changed scrollbar color to match the new Kickstarter theme color
Tweaked common text link color
 - Added some instances of links to the list
"Funding Canceled" box on product page is now red. 
Recoroled pledge reward description to a lighter color. 

Update 12/18/2017
Changed "Project We Love" background from transparent to green. 
Changed "View Gallery" background from really dark green to a transparent dark green. 
"View Gallery" exit button background is now transparent


Update 11/22/2017
- Fixed background color of images on project cards. So now when you load project cards (like opening all Tech Projects) there is no white background where the image should be while it is still loading. 
- Changed the social media buttons in the footer to a whiter color. Was too hard to see when they were black on some displays. 

Update 11/20/2017
 Kickstarter Updated their page over the weekend so it changed a few things. Here are the fixes:
 -- Front Page
 - White background on tabs and search/discover links
 - Currently active tab is colored similar to Kickstarters new color
 - Changed background on the product and company name that is overlayed on the "Featured Project" element
 - Darkened social media buttons on footer
 - Corrected text color on titles on footer
 - Changed "Remind Me Later" hover color to more closely resemble Kickstarters new color
 - Corrected "What We're Reading" card text color 
 -- Search 
 - Search bar is recolored
 - Search page background fixed
 -- Login
 - Some Text recolored
 - Main Background fixed
 - "or" recolored
 Possibly more fixes...

Update 09/10/17
- Removed Box Shadows from "Remind me" and "Share" buttons on project pages. 
- Recolored "Funding unsuccessful" box on project pages

Update 0.1.6
- Changed white gradient on Project Card descriptions to match background

Update 0.1.5
- Darkend input fields to #999
- Fixed hover issue with some buttons text turning same color as background

Updated 0.1.1-4
- Separated different sections of code, more labeling. Added kickstarter themed scrollbar.
- Few Extra Tweeks
- Missed a spot
- Almost completely done. Most things should be changed. 

Feedback
Always welcome. Let me know if I missed something. Or if the color is a little off. 

PS I'm always using flux.

*** Credit to Thermalzombie. I started this theme using Thermalzombi's Dark theme ***
